title: Aiball
notes: Steam shows Mixed (50% of 144). SteamDB shows 50.72% positive; blended to 50. Steam store lists Mixed reviews (144) and notes mouse, keyboard, joystick support.
raw_comment: Physics based game with soccer, king of the hill and sandbox mode. The ball doesn’t spawn in soccer mode and king of the hill seems broken. 2-10 local players. Shared screen.
